Plot Outline:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In September 1971, thieves tunneled into the vault of a bank in London&#039;s Baker
Street and looted safe deposit boxes of cash and jewelry worth over three 
million pounds. None of it was recovered. Nobody was ever arrested. The robbery 
made headlines for a few days and then disappeared - the result of a &#039;D&#039; Notice, 
gagging the press. This film reveals what was hidden for the first time. The 
story involves murder, corruption and a sex scandal with links to the Royal 
Family - a story in which the thieves were the most innocent people involved.

NOTES:
This is a re-encode of the CAMERA source, The release is cropped mainly at the 
top and a little at the sides also there is some noise in the audio now and again, 
but apart from that it&#039;s a pretty good CAM. i admit in places it is not that good
and in other places it is slightly orange see before and after.jpg, in this 
we did not pick the best shot in fact we picked the worst section of video..


WORK DONE:
Firstly i cleaned up the video so it was not so grey and looked more like its 
original intended colour by making it a tad darker and add some contrast, also 
added more chroma to it. i also boosted the audio to 200% and cut a few minites 
from the start of the video, the movies has not started and none of the movie 
has been lost all i cropped off was the person adjusting the camera before the 
movie.
